name.japanese: アッチーノファミリー

members.joinCircumstances: Leader of the family-based bounty hunting organization.

keyMoments.title: Climactic Battle Against Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Accino Family faces the Straw Hat Pirates in the final confrontation of the Ice Hunter Arc.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of the family's conflict with the Straw Hats over the stolen Jolly Roger.

keyMoments.title: Campacino Defeated
keyMoments.description: Campacino, the eldest son, is defeated by Puzzle, weakening the family's fighting force.
keyMoments.significance: Removes one of the family's key combatants from the battle.

bases.description: The Accino Family's frozen base of operations where they collect pirate flags as trophies.

members.joinCircumstances: Captain and founder of the Phoenix Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Puzzle Defeats Campacino
keyMoments.description: Captain Puzzle defeats Campacino, showing his renewed fighting spirit and helping the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Puzzle's recovery from his depression and commitment to helping the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Phoenix Pirates Flag Retrieved (Wrong Flag)
keyMoments.description: Chopper mistakenly grabs the Phoenix Pirates' flag instead of the Straw Hat flag.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a complication that extends the search for the correct flag.
